creator: pamclark1

title: Email download
content:
I have 2 email accounts on Thunderbird, both with the same ISP. I can get messages delivered to the inbox of my main account but Thunderbird no longer searches the server for messages on the secondary account. Both accounts are set up in Thunderbird with identical settings.

I have been online and read the support suggestions on how to resolve this but it hasn't worked. Support suggested it may be that the password has changed and advised me to remove the password from settings and next time I open Thunderbird I will be asked for my password. This did not happen. I removed the password from the account which is not downloading to my inbox and when I reopened Thunderbird I was not asked for the new password. However I can send emails from this secondary account.

I have checked webmail and there are definitely messages waiting there to download.

My main Thunderbird email (the one that is downloading messages to my inbox) is aparbury@comcen.com.au not the one showing on this log in.
creator: anabel.parbury

title: Vandaag onverwachte update naar 131
content: Vandaag kregen wij een onverwachte update van 131 (EN) Het is nog een test versie, maar wij kregen deze als stable versie. Zal een moment geweest zijn, maar terug kon niet meer want het profiel was ook geupdate.
creator: WEK

title: HO APPENA ACQUISTATO ALTRO SPAZIO DI ARCHIVIAZIONE PERCHE' ERA ESAURITO. HO RIAVVIATO IL PC E THUNDERBIRD NON FUNZIONA PIU'...
content:
Il tuo account Gmail ha smesso di funzionare Esaurito (100%) 15 GB

Sono trascorsi 30 giorni da quando hai raggiunto il limite di 15 GB di spazio di archiviazione per il tuo Account Google. A partire dal giorno 1 ott 2024, le email che ti sono state inviate sono tornate al mittente e non possono essere recuperate. D'ora in poi riceverai solo le email essenziali del tuo Account Google. Acquista altro spazio di archiviazione o liberane una parte per riprendere immediatamente la ricezione delle email.

HO APPENA ACQUISTATO ALTRO SPAZIO DI ARCHIVIAZIONE PERCHE' ERA ESAURITO. HO RIAVVIATO IL PC E THUNDERBIRD NON FUNZIONA PIU'...
creator: gigimetalli63

title: My Thunderbird goes through periods where it can receive but not send emails
content: My Thunderbird goes through periods where it can receive but not send emails. I am presented with the following message, see attachment. The number may vary but the message is always the same, I am being blacklisted. Can anyone tell me way this is happening, and what to do to fix it, Please? As far as I can remember, it sorts it self out, but it hasn't for over a week now and it is really frustrating. Thank you for reading this plea. Regards Ilio Pieroni
creator: Iliopier

title: 'Correspondent' or 'From' name is changed on emails coming in from our own website 'submit'.
content: When viewers submit a form on our website, the incoming email usually appears as subject 'quote request' with their name as the 'correspondent'. But since 2 days ago every 'quote request' is showing the same name as 'correspondent', the name of another customer we have been emailing back and forth with. He was originally a 'quote request' from about 4 or 5 months ago. It has changed to this name on every quote request email we have on the system, even going back 12 months! I know this is not a TB problem because it has only happened on our laptop, all the quote requests are still showing correct names on TB on our PC. So, it would appear that we have inadvertently clicked on something. Any ideas what we could have done wrong and, more importantly, how we can undo it? thanks Chris
creator: chris119

title: i can't reseave any mail from servers on the thunderbird.
content: as support told me to do, - here again this issue i have a email address connected to Thunderbird with outlook server and ( microsoft 365 outlook server) and msn mail address ( set as standard) but i also have a mail address connected for a own site online i made serif webplus software it was always working perfect,, till beginning september 2024 then i went VERY slow to get mail in mailbox i needed to ask to reseave 3-4 times and it took 5 to 10 minutes,, and after 19 september NOTHING came in again what ever i tryed - so i deleted all and install all again, i made all settings and firewall too - restarted but again nothing worked,, only sending worked with error that they send but not made a copy into the sendbox how can we fix the reseaving mail? i tryed many times to contact microsoft / outlook and mozilla/firefox but never got good easy understandable answers only links to some pages or forums i am no computer expert so some i do not understand or know where to find things, but i got 1 who answerd me and told me all should be the problem of the server company,, how and when can THEY fix the problem? or give me a refund for not able to use there services? answers please to konijn60@msn.com
creator: leftyg103
